name: Ne Touchez Pas 5
description: Navigate 100 levels in this very difficult, fast paced, simple action game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 23 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible or integrated sound chip Additional Notes: Screen resolution minimum 960x540 (1920x1080 recommended)
